title: Cottage
description: Escape to a charming countryside retreat where nature meets comfort. Nestled in a serene meadow, this cozy cottage offers a peaceful getaway with picturesque views and rustic charm. Featuring warm wooden interiors, a stone fireplace, and a sunlit porch, it's the perfect place to unwind. Whether you're sipping morning coffee surrounded by wildflowers or stargazing by the firepit, this cottage is a true haven of relaxation and beauty.

title: Beach House
description: Wake up to the soothing sound of waves and breathtaking ocean views at this stunning beach house retreat. Nestled along the shoreline, this coastal haven offers an open-concept design with sun-drenched interiors, panoramic windows, and a spacious deck perfect for soaking in the sea breeze.
